summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3705 for the improvement of 32nd Avenue South, from a point 94 feet south of the south margin of Massachusetts Street to north line of Colman Park; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenue, by sewers, under Ordinance No. 45558, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
